thread.title: Christina Maguire

author: Christina Maguire
title: Christina Maguire
text: I ordered two very large Roman blinds for a bedroom and was really pleased with my purchase. The quality of the blinds is excellent and all the cords that come with Roman blinds are all done for you. You simply have to attach the brackets to the window and clip in the top of the blind. So easy to install. I have just ordered another Roman blind and will definitely be ordering more.
